thread.title: KC pitcher Guthrie remembers Oregon hometown after shooting
thread.title_full: KC pitcher Guthrie remembers Oregon hometown after shooting

author: JAY COHEN
title: KC pitcher Guthrie remembers Oregon hometown after shooting
text:
Charles Rex Arbogast KC pitcher Guthrie remembers Oregon hometown after shooting 
Kansas City Royals pitcher Jeremy Guthrie, talks about growing up in Roseburg, Ore., where a gunman opened fire on students at Umpqua Community College near Roseburg today, before a baseball game between the Chicago White Sox and the Royals Thursday, Oct. 1, 2015, in Chicago. (AP Photo/Charles Rex Arbogast) Charles Rex Arbogast KC pitcher Guthrie remembers Oregon hometown after shooting 
Kansas City Royals pitcher Jeremy Guthrie, talks about growing up in Roseburg, Ore., where a gunman opened fire on students at Umpqua Community College near Roseburg today, before a baseball game between the Chicago White Sox and the Royals Thursday, Oct. 1, 2015, in Chicago. (AP Photo/Charles Rex Arbogast) Charles Rex Arbogast KC pitcher Guthrie remembers Oregon hometown after shooting 
Kansas City Royals pitcher Jeremy Guthrie, talks about growing up in Roseburg, Ore., where a gunman opened fire on students at Umpqua Community College near Roseburg today, before a baseball game between the Chicago White Sox and the Royals Thursday, Oct. 1, 2015, in Chicago. (AP Photo/Charles Rex Arbogast) Posted: Thursday, October 1, 2015 8:13 pm KC pitcher Guthrie remembers Oregon hometown after shooting Associated Press | 
CHICAGO (AP) — Kansas City Royals pitcher Jeremy Guthrie fondly remembers those days growing up in Oregon — riding his bike all around Roseburg, going to the local swimming pool and cheering on the basketball team at Umpqua Community College. 
All those memories came flooding back after a gunman opened fire at the school on Thursday, killing at least a dozen people before dying in a shootout with police.
